Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.localytics.android.Localytics.areNotificationsDisabled()
    @see #setNotificationsDisabled(boolean)
    com.localytics.android.Localytics.getInboxCampaigns()
    see Localytics.getDisplayableInboxCampaigns()
    com.localytics.android.MessagingListenerV2.localyticsShouldDeeplink(String)
    Please use CallToActionListener.localyticsShouldDeeplink(java.lang.String, com.localytics.android.Campaign)
    com.localytics.android.Localytics.setNotificationsDisabled(boolean)
    This is deprecated in SDK 5.1 so that the standard dimension "notifications enabled" can be directly tied to the OS setting. We recommend using a custom dimension to continue supporting any app-level notification settings.
